name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a report by Central News Agency today: Chinese singer Wang Yitai was originally scheduled to come to Taiwan for a tour on September 14 and 15, but because he used "Chinese Taipei" for promotion, Taiwan's Mainland Affairs Council said it was a violation and refused to grant permission.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a report by Central News Agency today: Chinese singer Wang Yitai was originally scheduled to come to Taiwan for a tour on September 14 and 15, but because he used "Chinese Taipei" for promotion, Taiwan's Mainland Affairs Council said it was a violation and refused to grant permission.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 25, a video of several girls being bullied at Chengdong Middle School in Guanghe County, Linxia Hui Autonomous Prefecture, Gansu Province, was circulated online. Subsequently, the local Internet police sent private messages asking everyone to delete the video.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"I really have a cow"
Shen Yi, a well-known patriotic blogger, recently posted several posts on Weibo to express his dissatisfaction with the housing pension system.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A list of fraudulent enterprises under the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of the State Council of China has been circulated online

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 25, it was reported that Bank of China President Liu Jin resigned from his positions as president and other positions due to personal reasons.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 25, CCTV News reported that "Telegram software founder Durov was arrested in France" and "popularized science" about the software.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 26, a netizen revealed that a propaganda slogan on a bus in Hangzhou reads "People can be made to do what we want, but not to understand why." Below the slogan is the explanation that reads "For the common people, we can only make them do what we want, but we cannot make them understand why we want to do it."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In 2023, the national police issued a notice to urgently remind parents of primary and secondary school students to check whether Telegram software is installed on their students’ mobile phones.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, blogger "营养科cici" released a video to teach people how to use "code words" to identify spies around them. For example, "Palace Jade Wine - 180 per cup, five words floating in the sky - that's nothing", etc. Netizens responded, "Who would have thought that a Chinese like me would become a spy?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 26, the Guanghe County Education Bureau and Public Security Bureau announced that the principal of the middle school involved had been dismissed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 26, the New York Times reported that the Nepalese government formally requested China to convert the US$216 million construction loan for Pokhara Airport, a "Belt and Road" project, into a "grant" and write off the debt.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 25, Heze, Shandong. Online reports that a child died of heat stroke during military training at Dan County Vocational Technical School in 36-degree weather. In the video, the child was lying in the hospital for emergency treatment. His family said the child had died. The school dormitory had no air conditioning or fans. On August 26, a staff member of Dan County Vocational Technical School said: "Military training has been stopped and the students have gone home for the holiday."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 26, the hot search for "Notice on the Chaos in Tank Truck Transport of Edible Oil" was removed from the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 26, the latest payment standards for residents' medical insurance in 2024 were announced: an increase of 30 yuan and 20 yuan respectively from the previous year, reaching no less than 670 yuan and 400 yuan per person per year respectively.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens commented on the housing pension system: Looking at the unfinished buildings across the country, they can’t even control the pre-sale fund supervision account of commercial housing. How can people believe that the “public account” of housing pensions can be well supervised?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 25, Yiyang, Hunan. A lawyer exposed the content of a meeting held by officials of Bijiashan Township on how to prevent villagers from petitioning. The meeting pointed out that stabilization and control is the primary task, and one person should be sent from the village and the police station to prepare for the crackdown; it is necessary to start with the children and send village cadres to take turns to hold the line. The lawyer said that the local leaders have sent the two women who petitioned in Beijing to prison, but their problems have not been solved.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens have compiled Professor Jin Canrong’s remarks on the Russia-Ukraine war from March 2022 to August 2024.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 25, a vicious slashing incident occurred at the junction of Yiliu Town and Yanquan Town in Yizhang, Hunan. According to reports, the suspect was a young man from the village who had just returned from work a few days ago. The injured were mostly elderly people. The injured have been sent to the hospital for treatment. Initial investigation showed that the man had a verbal dispute and stabbed others.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 26, a Ukrainian drone attacked a high-rise building in the southern Russian city of Saratov.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, it was reported online that the anti-counterfeiter "Tietou" was arrested for extortion. The anchor "Taiyuan Lao Ge" confirmed the news in public. In addition, a detention decision from the Binjiang Branch of the Hangzhou Public Security Bureau was also circulated on the Internet. The name on the decision was "Dong Guangming".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 25, a man who sells agricultural products reported JD.com under his real name, saying that JD.com froze the payment for no reason, making it impossible for them to pay the villagers. The man also revealed that there were more than 20 merchants whose payment had been frozen. He also said that the current environment is bad and all the profits have been eaten up by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the morning of the 26th, a Chinese Y-9 military reconnaissance aircraft briefly entered Japanese airspace near the coast of Nagasaki Prefecture, and the Japanese Air Self-Defense Force fighter jets took off urgently in response.
This is the first time that a Chinese military aircraft has intruded into Japanese airspace.
Just after 5 p.m. on the 26th, Japanese Foreign Ministry Vice Minister Okano summoned Shi Yong, the acting ambassador of the Chinese Embassy in Japan, to lodge an extremely severe protest and strongly demanded that measures be taken to prevent it from happening again.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 25, a picture of Li Bei, founder of Banxia Investment, at an internal forum for Peking University School of Economics alumni circulated online. In the picture, on the PPT behind Li Bei, the "current China in history comparable stages" were respectively matched to the Soviet Union, Venezuela, the Three Antis and Five Antis, and the Chongzhen period, sparking heated discussions among netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported that the entry of Chinese military aircraft into Japanese airspace today may be a response to the entry of a Japanese Maritime Self-Defense Force destroyer into Chinese territorial waters on July 4 to monitor the PLA's training in Zhejiang.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After the 25-year-old Shanxi internet celebrity "Guoren'er" committed suicide and was arranged to have a ghost marriage, many netizens shared their own stories of being arranged to have a ghost marriage.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 20, car review blogger Yuan Qicong was unable to maintain a straight line after testing Huawei Xiangjie S9 on a steep slope, and had a problem of bumpy steering. On August 21, blogger "Yizhenjianche" questioned Yuan Qicong for additional operations during the test, "crossing the ridge with the accelerator on, and stepping on the accelerator deeply on the way." On August 25, Xiangjie Automobile issued a statement, believing that the conclusion was not objective, rigorous, and misleading to consumers. In this test, the driver took the initiative to intervene and turned the steering wheel to the right to correct it, causing the vehicle to sway. Yuan Qicong immediately responded to Xiangjie Automobile in a live broadcast and said, "You said I affected your reputation, please sue me." Interestingly, Xiangjie Automobile mentioned "according to the data of the national monitoring platform" in the statement, but then Xiangjie revised the statement, changing "according to the data of the national monitoring platform" to "according to the platform data." This move aroused doubts from netizens. Some netizens replied, "The United States said that Huawei has a backdoor, I don't know yet...
fullContent:
8月20日，车评博主袁启聪在测试华为享界S9经过一飞坡路段后，车身无法保持直线行驶，出现了颠簸转向的问题。8月21日，博主“一针见车”质疑袁启聪在测试中有额外操作“带着电门过坎，途中还深踩一脚电门，”8月25日，享界汽车发表声明，认为该结论不客观、不严谨、对消费者会形成误导，在此次测试中，驾驶员主动干预，人为向右转动方向盘修正，导致车辆出现横摆。袁启聪随即开直播回应享界汽车并表示“说我影响你的商誉，请你起诉我”
 有意思的是享界汽车在声明中提到“根据国家监控平台数据”但随后享界又修改了声明，将“根据国家监控平台数据”改为“根据平台数据”这一举动引发网友质疑，有网友回复“美国说华为有后门，我还不信，现在来看冤枉美国了”
 截至目前发文，袁启聪微博账号已被禁言。微博CEO回复“全网封的，应该就是影响运营商环境了吧”汽车博主“老徐”也发文声援，认为袁启聪并不是在故意诋毁，并对官方利用行政力量去禁言的做法表示不满。
